channel.title: ASX:BSL on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in ASX:BSL on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: BlueScope FY Earnings Weighed by Global Steel Capacity Glut
item.description: BlueScope Steel Ltd.’s full-year underlying profit falls 51%, as a surplus of global steel capacity continued to weigh on prices and higher costs ate into margins.

item.title: South Australia’s Whyalla Steelworks Gets Potential Bid Interest From Consortium
item.description: BlueScope Steel Ltd. said it will lead an international consortium to bid for the beleaguered Whyalla steelworks in South Australia, investigating the possibility of converting the site into a low-car
